name: react-scratch-universal
description: minimal setup for react, webpack, babel

scripts.release:major: changelog -M -u https://github.com/tagraha/react-scratch && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m -u https://github.com/tagraha/react-scratch && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p -u https://github.com/tagraha/react-scratch && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch && git push origin --tags
scripts.start-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack -w & cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon server.js
scripts.prestart: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Tirta Nugraha <dev.nugrata@gmail.com>
